Name: Daiquiri No. 1 (countdown 3:2:1 formula)
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Made to the easy-to-remember 3:2:1 Daiquiri "countdown" formula (3 parts rum, 2 parts lime & 1 part sugar), this balanced and limey daiquiri suits a more characterful light rum.
History: I'm indebted to Roger Vilalta who in 2010 at Banker's Bar in Barcelona, Spain made yours truly an excellent daiquiri using this formula. See: Daiquiri Cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Daiquiri No. 1 (countdown 3:2:1 formula) contains 150 calories
